description: Construction of single storey ground floor rear extension, replacement of patio door and  window with double doors and new rear window.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ad7a6288-7fff-da35-111d-78dd1a97879e"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">T</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">he proposal by reason of its design, scale, and materials would be visually detrimental to the host building. It would neither preserve nor enhance the character and appearance of the host building.
